Details.Name: sc_main_benefit
Details.Feature: Earn 5x rewards points per S$1 spent online, on dining, and entertainment.
No min spend required for redemption.
Earn 1 reward point for every S$1 spend.

Details.Name: sc_promotion_cond
Details.Feature: 1. Select Samsonite RED Robo 65cm Luggage as the sign up gift. 2. Sign up and submit supporting documents online.

Details.Name: sc_gift_details
Details.Feature: 2 options: 1. Samsonite RED Robo 65cm Luggage worth S$335 OR 2. RedMart grocery voucher worth S$80

Details.Name: sc_gift_cond
Details.Feature: 1. Samsonite RED Robo 65cm Luggage (worth S$335): Charge a minimum of S$600 within the first month of card issuance. 2. S$80 RedMart grocery voucher: Charge a minimum of S$60 within the first month of card issuance. 3. Credit card applications must be submitted between 1 Feb 2016 - 31 March 2016, and receive application approval by 15 April 2016.

Details.Name: sc_other_fee
Details.Feature: Minimum Repayment: 3% of statement balance or S$50.

Details.Name: sc_disclosure
Details.Feature: Account must be in good standing and conducted in a proper and satisfactory manner as determined by HSBC in its sole discretion at the time of crediting the Rewards.
Dining and entertainment merchants exclude merchants within local hotels.
Online Transactions refer to retail transactions made via the internet and processed by the respective merchants/acquirers as an online transaction type through the Visa Worldwide networks.
